message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Take 100k and let's call it a day!
I'll take 900k this time, Alice. Seems fair to me, considering the inflation!
Let's try to be reasonable, Bob. I'll give you 150k, but this is my final offer. We can't keep playing this game forever.
Alice, I'm feeling generous this time. Let's split the money 850k to 150k. What do you say?
